title: Campaign Tracking Logs
description: Campaign marketing events such as opens, clicks,links and impressions.

xdm:externalId.title: External Identifier
xdm:externalId.description: External Identifier that defines the primary identity value for profile and audience.

xdm:campaignId.title: Campaign Identifier
xdm:campaignId.description: Identifier of the marketing campaign to which activity originating this message belongs to.

xdm:campaignName.title: Campaign Name
xdm:campaignName.description: Internal Name that uniquely identifies the Campaign.

xdm:campaignLabel.title: Campaign Label
xdm:campaignLabel.description: A human-friendly label of the marketing campaign which is originating this message.

xdm:broadlogId.title: Delivery Log Identifier
xdm:broadlogId.description: Identifier of the marketing campaign delivery log this event belongs to.

xdm:deliveryId.title: Delivery Identifier
xdm:deliveryId.description: The delivery activity originating this message.

xdm:visitorId.title: Visitor Identifier
xdm:visitorId.description: Visitor that was targeted as part of the delivery.

xdm:recipientId.title: Recipient Identifer
xdm:recipientId.description: Recipient that was targeted as part of this delivery.

xdm:serviceId.title: Service Identifier
xdm:serviceId.description: Subscribed Service that targeted this delivery.

xdm:deliveryName.title: Delivery Name
xdm:deliveryName.description: Internal Name that uniquely identifies the delivery.

xdm:deliveryLabel.title: Delivery Label
xdm:deliveryLabel.description: A human-friendly label of the delivery which is originating this message.

xdm:deliveryMode.title: Delivery Mode
xdm:deliveryMode.description: Mode of delivery for the messages sent.

xdm:trackinglogId.title: Tracking Log Identifier
xdm:trackinglogId.description: Primary Key of the tracking log.

xdm:urlCategory.title: URL Category
xdm:urlCategory.description: The category of the link. It may be `subscription`, or a user-defined category.
